ProductInfo.Features:
8 Channel Full CIF realtime surveillance recorder and playback surveillance DVR.
Includes 4 high resolution 520TVL cameras with Infra Red Cut Filter (ICR) function and powerful night vision to 50ft for indoor/outdoor use.
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote MAC or PC, iPhone, iPad, or Android. Receive email alerts with Snapshot upon motion detection.
Powerful Plug and Play function, Powerful push alarm function and Free DDNS to use.
Combination DVR with 10'' color LCD touch screen to bring you great images. Fashionable design with high performance.
ProductInfo.Name: Insmartec In-KT8184E-500GB 10 Inch 8 Channel DVR LCD Monitor H.264 Security DVR System with 4 Night Vision IR 520TVL Bullet Cameras and 500GB Hard Drive Home CCTV Surveillance Equipment (Sliver)
